产品型号: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, HP LaserJet Managed Printers
漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers may potentially be vulnerable to Remote Code Execution and Elevation of Privilege when processing a PostScript print job.
受影响版本: See HP security bulletin reference for affected versions

产品型号: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, HP LaserJet Managed Printers
漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers may potentially be vulnerable to Remote Code Execution and Elevation of Privilege when processing a PostScript print job.
受影响版本: See HP security bulletin reference for affected versions

产品型号: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, HP LaserJet Managed Printers
漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP LaserJet Enterprise, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers may potentially be vulnerable to Remote Code Execution and Elevation of Privilege when processing a PostScript print job.
受影响版本: See HP security bulletin reference for affected versions

漏洞描述:
Certain HP LaserJet Pro printers may potentially
experience a denial of service when a user sends a raw JPEG file to the printer
via IPP (Internet Printing Protocol).
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro devices are potentially vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack via the web management interface of the device.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

产品型号: Certain LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, HP LaserJet Managed Printers
漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow when performing a GET request to scan jobs.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow related to the compact font format parser.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Denial of Service when using the backup & restore feature through the embedded web service on the device.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Potential Remote Code Execution and/or Elevation of Privilege via Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) using the Web Service Eventing model.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Heap Overflow and/or Remote Code Execution.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Remote Code Execution.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to Buffer Overflow and/or Elevation of Privilege.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

漏洞描述: Certain HP LaserJet Pro print products are potentially vulnerable to an Elevation of Privilege and/or Information Disclosure related to a lack of authentication with certain endpoints.
受影响版本: See HP Security Bulletin reference for affected versions.

产品型号: HP LaserJet Pro M501 Series J8H61A; HP LaserJet Pro M501 Series J8H60A
漏洞描述: Potential security vulnerabilities have been discovered on a certain HP LaserJet Pro printer that may allow an unauthorized user to reconfigure, reset the device.

产品型号: HP LaserJet Pro M501 Series J8H61A; HP LaserJet Pro M501 Series J8H60A
漏洞描述: Potential security vulnerabilities have been discovered on a certain HP LaserJet Pro printer that may allow a Denial of Service on the device.
